entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
